name: msk.ai
slogan: The intelligence advancing MSK care and discovery
description:
msk.ai develops technology to improve decision-making in orthopaedic surgery. We have an existing successful patient-monitoring platform, based around delivering data insights from smartphone and wearable sensors.

We are in stealth-mode developing new technologies using Computer Vision, Machine Learning, 2D/3D graphics and high-end laser/camera hardware.

team.name: Tim Closs
team.bioHtml: CTO with deep experience in software product strategy, software development, mobile apps and games • Studied at @University of Cambridge

jobs.title: C++/3D developer for medical R&D project integration phase
jobs.description:
msk.ai develops technology to improve decision-making in orthopaedic surgery. We have an existing successful patient-monitoring platform, based around delivering data insights from smartphone and wearable sensors.

We have made strong progress through a stealth-mode R&D project using Computer Vision, Machine Learning, 2D/3D graphics and high-end laser/camera hardware. We now require a 3D/C++ developer to integrate existing working C++ components into an existing 2D/3D GUI application (using UnrealEngine).

Skills required:
- C++ / Visual Studio 2019 / Windows
- Strong 3D and some 2D graphics
- Ability to work within a very simple UnrealEngine project
- Comfortable using a 3rd party hardware C++ SDK
- Comfortable using OpenCV (at a simple level)
- Comfortable using Google TensorFlow C++ SDK

We would like initially to work with a contractor for 1 week, and then ideally be able to extend, based upon good progress being made.

This is an opportunity to play a key role in delivering a ground-breaking R&D project for an industry-leading client.

PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT US IF YOU ARE A DEVELOPMENT OR RECRUITMENT AGENCY, AS WE WILL NOT RESPOND.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
msk.ai develops technology to improve decision-making in orthopaedic surgery. We have an existing successful patient-monitoring platform, based around delivering data insights from smartphone and wearable sensors.

We have made strong progress through a stealth-mode R&D project using Computer Vision, Machine Learning, 2D/3D graphics and high-end laser/camera hardware. We now require a 3D/C++ developer to integrate existing working C++ components into an existing 2D/3D GUI application (using UnrealEngine).

Skills required:

  • C++ / Visual Studio 2019 / Windows
  • Strong 3D and some 2D graphics
  • Ability to work within a very simple UnrealEngine project
  • Comfortable using a 3rd party hardware C++ SDK
  • Comfortable using OpenCV (at a simple level)
  • Comfortable using Google TensorFlow C++ SDK

We would like initially to work with a contractor for 1 week, and then ideally be able to extend, based upon good progress being made.

This is an opportunity to play a key role in delivering a ground-breaking R&D project for an industry-leading client.

PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT US IF YOU ARE A DEVELOPMENT OR RECRUITMENT AGENCY, AS WE WILL NOT RESPOND.
